amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ PROHIBITION AGAINST DIRECT FUNDING FOR SAUDI ARABIA \ SEC.__. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available pursuant to this Act shall be obligated or expended to finance any assistance to Saudi Arabia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any U.S. assistance to Saudi Arabia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 191 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
